name: The Roost
description:
Ver 0.81 for testing and feedback.

This is a little swipey jumpy game designed for touch-screens but also playable with a mouse. Currently downloadable as a Windows installer but be available for Android phones at a later date.

Simply touch (or click) and swipe to jump. New abilities can be unlocked by purchasing "Hats".

Enjoy. Feedback is very much appreciated.
